title: Seed 30 additional prompts and surface them in the Prompt Library

requirements.text: Add 30 new high-quality AI prompt records distributed across the existing backend categories (#videoGeneration, #photoGeneration, #cgiAds, #marketing, #storytelling, #business, #socialMedia, #design) so they are persisted in the canister state and returned by the existing prompt listing APIs (e.g., getAllPrompts, getPromptsByCategory). Each new prompt must include: title, description, fullText, tags, and correct values for isPopular/isNew/isPremium.

quotes: Add 30 more high-quality AI prompts across all categories. Make them visible in the prompt library.

acceptanceCriteria: Exactly 30 additional PromptRecord entries are added to the persisted dataset used by the canister (not just created via admin UI).
New prompts are spread across all existing categories; no prompt uses a category outside the enum defined in backend/main.mo.
Each new prompt has non-empty title, description, and fullText, and includes at least 3 tags.
After deployment/upgrade, getAllPrompts returns the previous prompts plus these 30 new ones (subject to existing premium gating behavior).

requirements.text: Ensure the newly added prompts are visible in the existing Prompt Library UI by relying on the current prompt fetch flow (useGetAllPrompts â†’ PromptLibraryPage) without adding new UI controls or requiring manual admin creation steps.

quotes: Make them visible in the prompt library.

acceptanceCriteria: Prompt Library page shows an increased prompt count matching the backend getAllPrompts response for the current user.
The 30 new prompts can be found via existing search/category filters and open correctly in the prompt details view using existing routes.
No new UI controls are introduced specifically to expose these prompts (visibility is achieved via the existing listing APIs).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).

Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
nonGoals: Adding new prompt categories beyond the existing enum.
Implementing new admin tooling/workflows for bulk prompt creation.
